tls:text.tls:line: Heaven is exalted and Earth is humble,

sense.def: the sky

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven is exalted and Earth is humble,

sense.def: be regarded as noble, be honoured> be distinguished, enjoy elevated status (also of things like meritorious achievements)

tls:text.tls:line: Heaven is exalted and Earth is humble,

sense.def: be lowly, humble, hold low social status, menial; have a low status; be on a low level; also of one's reputation: be low

tls:text.tls:line: and Qian and Kun are defined.

sense.def: archaic, metaphysical: Heaven (YI)

tls:text.tls:line: and Qian and Kun are defined.

sense.def: (abstract, cosmological:) earth (YI)

tls:text.tls:line: and Qian and Kun are defined.

sense.def: be stable and fixed, have taken a fixed shape

tls:text.tls:line: The humble and the high position in the hexagram having already been set out,

sense.def: relative status, relative elevatedness; the dimension of being high or lowly

tls:text.tls:line: The humble and the high position in the hexagram having already been set out,

sense.def: what is low, the low thing, a low place

tls:text.tls:line: The humble and the high position in the hexagram having already been set out,

sense.def: that which is high; the high thing; high point, elevation

tls:text.tls:line: The humble and the high position in the hexagram having already been set out,

sense.def: by this time, already; after; after a while

tls:text.tls:line: The humble and the high position in the hexagram having already been set out,

sense.def: be laid out clearly, be made explicit; be publicly pronounced (of words)

tls:text.tls:line: and the noble and the base find their proper places.

sense.def: relative status; dimension of status

tls:text.tls:line: and the noble and the base find their proper places.

sense.def: be apportioned a proper place

tls:text.tls:line: Action and inaction have their constant norm

sense.def: failure or refusal to take intiatives; nonactivity

tls:text.tls:line: Action and inaction have their constant norm

sense.def: constant norm; highest norm; routine; constancy in attitude

tls:text.tls:line: and the hard and the pliable are determined.

sense.def: that which is firm, the firm and strong things; a hard substance

tls:text.tls:line: and the hard and the pliable are determined.

sense.def: what is soft, the soft things; soft things

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535, tr. Lynn p. 47

tls:text.tls:line: Methods group things according to (artificial) categories,

sense.def: according to, in the way of (emperor Yáo etc); according to (the right season); at (a certain time)

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535, tr. Lynn p. 47

tls:text.tls:line: Methods group things according to (artificial) categories,

sense.def: natural kind, kind, class

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535, tr. Lynn p. 47

tls:text.tls:line: Methods group things according to (artificial) categories,

sense.def: mostly of persons, but occasionally also of things like insects: assemble

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535, tr. Lynn p. 47

tls:text.tls:line: and creatures divide up according to (natural) groups. See JZ Liu Hui 1.9

sense.def: (kind of) living creature 百物; 天物 "the creatures of this world that are from Heaven"

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535, tr. Lynn p. 47

tls:text.tls:line: and creatures divide up according to (natural) groups. See JZ Liu Hui 1.9

sense.def: flock; group

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535, tr. Lynn p. 47

tls:text.tls:line: [And as a result of all this] good fortune and misfortune arise.

sense.def: (Heaven-sent) auspicious events or good fortune

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535, tr. Lynn p. 47

tls:text.tls:line: [And as a result of all this] good fortune and misfortune arise.

sense.def: the dimension of auspiciousness versus inauspiciousness; auspiciousness or otherwise

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535, tr. Lynn p. 47

tls:text.tls:line: [And as a result of all this] good fortune and misfortune arise.

sense.def: terrible supernaturally ordained disaster; great bad luck; major misfortune; dire consequences 百凶

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535, tr. Lynn p. 47

tls:text.tls:line: In [the realm of] Heaven these bring about symbolic images,

sense.def: in; at

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535, tr. Lynn p. 47

tls:text.tls:line: and in [the realm of] Earth they bring about [concrete physical] forms,

sense.def: in; at

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535, tr. Lynn p. 47

tls:text.tls:line: and in [the realm of] Earth they bring about [concrete physical] forms,

sense.def: practise successfully; to bring to completion; to bring to a successful conclusion; to accomplish; give its full form to; to make complete and perfect

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535, tr. Lynn p. 47

tls:text.tls:line: and in [the realm of] Earth they bring about [concrete physical] forms,

sense.def: three-dimensional physical visible shape

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535, tr. Lynn p. 47

tls:text.tls:line: so change and transformation manifest themselves. [1132]

sense.def: the various changes in the world; all kinds of change

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535, tr. Lynn p. 47

tls:text.tls:line: so change and transformation manifest themselves. [1132]

sense.def: become visible, appear, come to light; show one's face

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: The hard and soft stroke each other,

sense.def: that which is firm, the firm and strong things; a hard substance

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: The hard and soft stroke each other,

sense.def: what is soft, the soft things; soft things

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: The hard and soft stroke each other,

sense.def: in mutual interaction> each other, mutually

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: The hard and soft stroke each other,

sense.def: rub against; polish; whet; pat

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: the eight trigrams activate each other. [1133]

sense.def: the eight trigrams

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: the eight trigrams activate each other. [1133]

sense.def: trigram

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: the eight trigrams activate each other. [1133]

sense.def: activate??

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: They urge things on with claps of thunder,

sense.def: urge on, encourage to engage in activity

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: They urge things on with claps of thunder,

sense.def: thunder

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: they moisten them with thunderstorms,/

sense.def: moisten

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: they moisten them with thunderstorms,/

sense.def: thunderstorm

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: Sun and moon take their regular paths,

sense.def: follow one's regular course

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: Sun and moon take their regular paths,

sense.def: course along on a revolving circular course (typically said of stars in the Heavens)

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: Sun and moon take their regular paths,

sense.def: (of heavenly bodies or the four seasons) take their course, move along one's course

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: and at one time it is cold, at another it is hot./ [1134]

sense.def: it is cold

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 1.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: and at one time it is cold, at another it is hot./ [1134]

sense.def: it is hot

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: The Way of Qian gives complete form to the male,

sense.def: archaic, metaphysical: Heaven (YI)

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: The Way of Qian gives complete form to the male,

sense.def: practise successfully; to bring to completion; to bring to a successful conclusion; to accomplish; give its full form to; to make complete and perfect

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: The Way of Qian gives complete form to the male,

sense.def: the male principle; maleness

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: the Way of Kun gives complete form to the female. [1135]

sense.def: (abstract, cosmological:) earth (YI)

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: the Way of Kun gives complete form to the female. [1135]

sense.def: practise successfully; to bring to completion; to bring to a successful conclusion; to accomplish; give its full form to; to make complete and perfect

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: the Way of Kun gives complete form to the female. [1135]

sense.def: the biological category of the female

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: Qian oversees the Great Beginning,

sense.def: the great beginning

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: and Kun is activated/activates itself to form things. [1136]

sense.def: produce as a complete product, create so as to be a complete thing

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: Qian oversees things through natural ease,

sense.def: Heaven (as an agent overseeing what happens on earth)

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: Qian oversees things through natural ease,

sense.def: easy naturalness

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: Qian oversees things through natural ease,

sense.def: KNOW ALL ABOUT> be fully in charge of, be formally and politically in charge of

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: and Kun is capableof things through natural simplicity. [1137]

sense.def: simplicity

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 535f, tr. Lynn p. 48

tls:text.tls:line: and Kun is capableof things through natural simplicity. [1137]

sense.def: be capable and competent; be able to act, be in a position to act

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 536, tr. Lynn p. 48f

tls:text.tls:line: If something is possessed of natural ease, it is easy to understand;

sense.def: get properly known, get found out; become well-known; get properly understood

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 536, tr. Lynn p. 48f

tls:text.tls:line: and if something is possessed of natural simplicity, it is easy to follow.

sense.def: be simple, uncontrived

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 536, tr. Lynn p. 48f

tls:text.tls:line: and if something is possessed of natural simplicity, it is easy to follow.

sense.def: be followed (as a deliberate act)

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 536, tr. Lynn p. 48f

tls:text.tls:line: if something has intimate allies then it can be made to last,

sense.def: close associates; friends

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 536, tr. Lynn p. 48f

tls:text.tls:line: if something has intimate allies then it can be made to last,

sense.def: the capacity to be made enduring

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 536, tr. Lynn p. 48f

tls:text.tls:line: if something has intimate allies then it can be made to last,

sense.def: be made to last long

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 536, tr. Lynn p. 48f

tls:text.tls:line: The capacity to be made to last, that is the inner power of the man of worth.

sense.def: the highest form of virtue, true virtue, true inner power

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 536, tr. Lynn p. 48f

tls:text.tls:line: the capacity to be made to be great, that is the main purpose of the man of worth [1138]

sense.def: be made large or important

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 536, tr. Lynn p. 48f

tls:text.tls:line: the capacity to be made to be great, that is the main purpose of the man of worth [1138]

sense.def: main purpose in public life, main professional aim; main mission; inherited professional aim

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 536, tr. Lynn p. 48f

tls:text.tls:line: As Qián and Kùn] being possessed of natural ease and natural simplicity

sense.def: be easy and natural; be easy and trifling; be an easy matter 甚易

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 536, tr. Lynn p. 48f

tls:text.tls:line: As Qián and Kùn] being possessed of natural ease and natural simplicity

sense.def: be simple, uncontrived

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 536, tr. Lynn p. 48f

tls:text.tls:line: the principles of All under Heaven are (got>) put in place.

sense.def: the universe 天下無人

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 536, tr. Lynn p. 48f

tls:text.tls:line: the principles of All under Heaven are (got>) put in place.

sense.def: be obtained> be at hand; be got hold of

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 536, tr. Lynn p. 48f

tls:text.tls:line: they give complete form to the space/position between them.

sense.def: practise successfully; to bring to completion; to bring to a successful conclusion; to accomplish; give its full form to; to make complete and perfect

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 536, tr. Lynn p. 48f

tls:text.tls:line: they give complete form to the space/position between them.

sense.def: place, proper place

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 2.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 536, tr. Lynn p. 48f

tls:text.tls:line: they give complete form to the space/position between them.

sense.def: inside, in the middle of N 其中x

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 537f, tr. Lynn p. 49f

tls:text.tls:line: The sages

sense.def: the sages (of antiquity) (enumerable, with tensed predicate)

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 537f, tr. Lynn p. 49f

tls:text.tls:line: set up the [concrete] hexagrams

sense.def: set up, establish administratively; arrange for, make preparations for

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 537f, tr. Lynn p. 49f

tls:text.tls:line: and [thus] and thus systematically observed the abstract images;

sense.def: critically observe, watch carefully; look over carefully and systematically, make an overall investigation; survey and examine

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 537f, tr. Lynn p. 49f

tls:text.tls:line: They appended the Statements

sense.def: appended 繫辭

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 537f, tr. Lynn p. 49f

tls:text.tls:line: They appended the Statements

sense.def: tie to a thing to something else; tie up so as to assemble; keep tied up

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 537f, tr. Lynn p. 49f

tls:text.tls:line: They appended the Statements

sense.def: text; formulation, statement; sentence; rhetoric CHECK EXAMPLES

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 537f, tr. Lynn p. 49f

tls:text.tls:line: and thus clarified the auspiciousness/inauspiciousness (which they imply). [1140]

sense.def: the dimension of auspiciousness versus inauspiciousness; auspiciousness or otherwise

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 537f, tr. Lynn p. 49f

tls:text.tls:line: so that they produce change and transformation. [1141]

sense.def: the various changes in the world; all kinds of change

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 537f, tr. Lynn p. 49f

tls:text.tls:line: the auspicious and the inauspicious lines

sense.def: auspicious line in a trigram

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 537f, tr. Lynn p. 49f

tls:text.tls:line: Change and transformation

sense.def: the various changes in the world; all kinds of change

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 537f, tr. Lynn p. 49f

tls:text.tls:line: are images of day and night.

sense.def: daytime-(meal etc)

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 537f, tr. Lynn p. 49f

tls:text.tls:line: are images of day and night.

sense.def: nighttime

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.3.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 538, tr. Lynn p. 50

tls:text.tls:line: "Since Heaven succours him,

sense.def: since

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.3.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 538, tr. Lynn p. 50

tls:text.tls:line: "Since Heaven succours him,

sense.def: come to the divine aid of, support by divine means

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.3.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 538, tr. Lynn p. 50

tls:text.tls:line: things turn out auspicious [for him] and nothing fails to be to his advantage." [1145]

sense.def: turn out auspiciously

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.3.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 538, tr. Lynn p. 50

tls:text.tls:line: things turn out auspicious [for him] and nothing fails to be to his advantage." [1145]

sense.def: all of the subjects

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 3.3.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 538, tr. Lynn p. 50

tls:text.tls:line: things turn out auspicious [for him] and nothing fails to be to his advantage." [1145]

sense.def: turn out advantageous, provide profit

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 4.2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 538f, tr. Lynn p. 50f

tls:text.tls:line: The differentiation between the auspicious and the inauspicious

sense.def: the dimension of auspiciousness versus inauspiciousness; auspiciousness or otherwise

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 4.2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 538f, tr. Lynn p. 50f

tls:text.tls:line: pronounce on minor blemishes.

sense.def: refer to

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 4.2.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 538f, tr. Lynn p. 50f

tls:text.tls:line: One who has no blame attached

sense.def: fault, moral responsibility for an unfortunate state of affairs

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 4.2.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 538f, tr. Lynn p. 50f

tls:text.tls:line: Saving those who (suffer misfortune but are) "without blame"

sense.def: fault, moral responsibility for an unfortunate state of affairs

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 4.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 538f, tr. Lynn p. 50f

tls:text.tls:line: As for the statements in general,

sense.def: statement; MO: proposition

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 5.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 539f, tr. Lynn p. 51f

tls:text.tls:line: Above we use [the Changes] to systematically observe the configurations of Heaven,

sense.def: one the one hand (and on the other) 仰...俯

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 5.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 539f, tr. Lynn p. 51f

tls:text.tls:line: and below we use it to examine precisely the patterns of Earth.

sense.def: and also 仰...俯

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 5.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 539f, tr. Lynn p. 51f

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore one understands the reasons behind what is hidden and what is clear,

sense.def: what is mysterious

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 5.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 539f, tr. Lynn p. 51f

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore one understands the reasons behind what is hidden and what is clear,

sense.def: what is evident and clear

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 6.1, ed. Lou Yulie p. 540f, tr. Lynn p. 52

tls:text.tls:line: It (Changes? Way? One) is patterned on Heaven and Earth,

sense.def: look like; be similar in appearance

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 6.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 540f, tr. Lynn p. 52

tls:text.tls:line: understands fate.

sense.def: the principles of fate

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 8.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 541f, tr. Lynn p. 52,

tls:text.tls:line: When the benevolent see it they call it benevolence,

sense.def: abstractly: "the benevolent person; the human-hearted person" at any time and in any place

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 8.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 541f, tr. Lynn p. 52,

tls:text.tls:line: and when the competent see it they call it int elligence.

sense.def: intelligent people

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 9.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 542f, tr. Lynn p. 54

tls:text.tls:line: Insofar as it gives full form to abstract images, we call it Qián.

sense.def: archaic, metaphysical: Heaven (YI)

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 9.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 542f, tr. Lynn p. 54

tls:text.tls:line: Insofar as it imitates these patterns [set by the abstract images], we call it Kūn. [1161]

sense.def: HF 8.1.15: emulate (the sage); imitate; live up to; act according to

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 9.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 542f, tr. Lynn p. 54

tls:text.tls:line: Masterig the technique so as to understand the future is called 'prognostication',

sense.def: what is to come, the future; the next thing

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 9.3, ed. Lou Yulie p. 542f, tr. Lynn p. 54

tls:text.tls:line: What from the Yin and the Yang one cannot fathom is called 'the supernatural.' [1163]

sense.def: fathom, assess depth or height of (physical objects)

tls:line.title: 周易(en)
tls:line.loc: XC 10.1.2, ed. Lou Yulie p. 544, tr. Lynn p. 55

tls:text.tls:line: As for Qian,

sense.def: archaic, metaphysical: Heaven (YI)
